price: Yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn, εmfa yεn nyε nsͻhwε mma wͻn a wͻnnye nnie no, na Yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn, fa yεn bͻne kyε yεn. Nokorε sε Wo ne Otumfoͻ a Wotumi ade nyinaa yε, Wo ne Onyansafoͻ no”.
arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا رَبَّنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
category: She that is to be Examined

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: rabbanā lā tajʿalnā fit'natan lilladhīna kafarū wa-igh'fir lanā rabbanā innaka anta al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
